description:
As one of the world’s largest and most-impactful youth-serving NGOs, JA Worldwide delivers hands on, immersive learning in entrepreneurship, work readiness, and financial health. Reaching more than 15 million young people each year through over 400,000 teachers and business volunteers, JA Worldwide is one of few organizations with the scale, experience, and passion to build a boundless future for the next generation of innovators, entrepreneurs, and leaders.

JA Worldwide is a network of teams: Each JA entity has its own board of directors and staff and each operation, whether large or small, works with young people, has an online presence, raises funds, manages finances, delivers programs, organizes events, collects/shares data, and handles diverse legal and compliance issues. In addition to working with young people of all ages and a vast alumni community, JA is in contact with volunteers, teachers and nearly 100,000 schools each year. JA Worldwide has been selected as one of the top ten NGOs in the world in annual rankings since 2019 and was nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize in 2022 and 2023.
name: JA Worldwide
tagline: As one of the world’s largest youth-serving NGOs, JA Worldwide prepares young people for employment and entrepreneurship

updates.text:
Join us on Tuesday, October 29, right here on Instagram at 11amEDT/6pmCET/11pmHKT for a special episode of JA Live.

The JA Americas Alumni network is rebuilding its regional structure, and they're searching for a visionary leader to take on the role of regional JA alumni president. Could this be your next big step?

JA Worldwide's Dana Khairallah will speak with Loran Geskens, President of JA Alumni Europe, and Nelly Cetera, JA Americas Alumni Coordinator, to explore the rewards and challenges of leading an alumni network. Tune in to learn about the impact of regional leadership, network growth, and why this opportunity could be a game-changer for you.

Don’t miss this inspiring conversation!

Ready to unlock the next level of your JA journey? Secure your place on October 24 to become part of a global community of JA alumni driving change with impact.

This is your chance to be a part of something bigger. Whether you want to lead, learn, or collaborate with like-minded changemakers, this opportunity is for you.

Mark your calendars, and get ready to make an impact. It all starts with a one-minute form . . . on October 24! #JACB24

The countdown is almost over. Stay tuned!

Three regional JA Company of the Year competitions remain in 2024: INJAZ Al-Arab/JA MENA, Junior Achievement Americas, and Junior Achievement Africa. The winners of these JA Company Program competitions will automatically become finalists for the 2025 De la Vega Global Entrepreneurship Award, joining the champions from JA Europe, JA Asia Pacific, and Junior Achievement USA.

Find dates and locations of the upcoming regional competitions, supported by FedEx, and learn about the 2025 finalists and past winners at https://lnkd.in/dbpCnWas.

The JA alumni spirit knows no boundaries. We’re cooking up something special that will connect passionate individuals across the globe. 

Take the lead, build communities, and create impact as a certified member of the JA community. 

Curious? You should be! This opportunity will transform your JA journey.

The countdown has begun . . .

We'll see you on October 24! #JACB24

The wait is over, JA alumni! 
 
We're thrilled to announce the JA Community Builders Certificate, your passport to becoming a certified leader in the global JA alumni community. This isn't just another course. It's your opportunity to . . .
 
• Master community leadership skills
• Connect with changemakers worldwide
• Turn your JA experience into real-world impact
• Earn a specialized certification
 
Be among the first to join this transformative journey. Join the exclusive waiting list and reimagine what it means to be a JA alumnus: https://lnkd.in/emSBAzXQ  
 
Early birds get special, exclusive access to the course. Don't miss out.

Hey, JA alumni: Are you wondering what's next in your JA journey? Do you want to learn more about the global JA alumni movement?

We're about to unveil a game-changing opportunity for JA alumni who dream big and lead bigger. Get ready to take your JA experience to new heights and join a community of changemakers who are reshaping the future. 

Stay tuned . . . 

The next chapter begins October 24!
